name: Tumblr cherry blossom flower background theme
description:
spring cherry blossom background
basic resolution: 1920 x 1080
you can change bg image size to fit your resolution
You can "ONLY" change background things, 
(like a bg image, some colors... you know except the icons)
It's not include any Icons!

please use this together : http://userstyles.org/styles/95980/remove-blue-bits
additional_info: HOW TO CHANGE BG IMAGE TO FIT YOUR RESOLUTION 1) install this teme,and find out your resolution click here 2) reference choose your resolution, and click the "see it" with right mouse button, and click "copy link address" 3) reference back to tumblr dashboard, click the stylish icon, find Tumblr cherry blossom flower background theme on the list, and click the edit, under the title. 4) reference drag the background url (please look at reference) 5) reference press "Ctrl+V", replace background url 6)reference click "save" now it's done!!!! Feedback to my blog My blog : http://lilydoepotter.tumblr.com/
